sen.j: 東舞鶴公園野球場（ひがしまいづるこうえんやきゅうじょう）は京都府舞鶴市の東舞鶴公園内にある野球場である。
sen.e: Higashi Maizuru Park Stadium is a baseball stadium located in Higashi Maizuru Park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Higashi Maizuru Park Stadium is a baseball stadium located in Higashi Maizuru Park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Higashi Maizuru Park Stadium is a baseball stadium located in Higashi Maizuru Park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is commonly called "Maizuru Stadium."
It is commonly called "Maizuru Stadium."
It is commonly called Maizuru Kyujo (Maizuru Stadium).
sen.cmt: 通称なので、ローマ字読みも補足しました。

sen.j: 1976年（昭和51年）に舞鶴市が建設すると、京都府北部で唯一の大型野球場として高校野球のみならず、プロ野球の二軍戦などが行われている。
sen.e: Ever since Maizuru City built the stadium in 1976, not only high-school baseball games but also the farm team games have been held here as it is the only large-scale baseball stadium in northern Kyoto.

Ever since Maizuru City built the stadium in 1976, not only high-school baseball games, but also the farm team games have been held here as it is the only large-scale baseball stadium in northern Kyoto.

Ever since Maizuru City built the stadium in 1976, not only high-school baseball games, but also the farm team games have been held here as it is the only large-scale baseball stadium in northern Kyoto.

sen.j: また土日休日等には市民野球や少年野球の大会なども開かれる。
sen.e: On Saturday, Sunday and holidays, amateur and children's baseball tournaments take place.
On Saturday, Sunday, and holidays, amateur and children's baseball tournaments take place.
On Saturday, Sunday, and holidays, amateur and children's baseball tournaments take place.
The stadium measures 92 meters in the left- and right- fields
The stadium measures 92 meters in the left- and right- fields
The stadium measures 92 meters in the left- and right- fields
120 meters in the center field.
120 meters in the center field.
120 meters in the center field.
The seating Capacity is about 10,000 people.
The seating Capacity is about 10,000 people.
The seating capacity is about 10,000 people.

sen.j: 内野 土、外野 天然芝
sen.e: The infield is clay and the outfield is natural grass.
The infield is clay and the outfield is natural grass.
The infield is clay and the outfield is natural grass.
There are no night game facilities.
There are no night game facilities.
There are no night game facilities.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道舞鶴線東舞鶴駅下車。
sen.e: Get off the train at Higashi Maizuru Station on JR West Maizuru Line.
Get off the train at Higashi Maizuru Station on the JR West Maizuru Line.
Get off the train at Higashi Maizuru Station on the JR West Maizuru Line.

sen.j: 京都交通 (舞鶴)白鳥線・丸山口バス停下車、徒歩約10分。
sen.e: Get off the bus at the Maruyamaguchi Bus Stop on Kyoto Kotsu Bus (Maizuru) Shiratori route.
Get off the bus at the Maruyamaguchi Bus Stop on Kyoto Kotsu Bus (Maizuru) Shiratori route.
Approximately 10 minutes walk from Maruyamaguchi Bus Stop on Kyoto Kotsu Bus (Maizuru) Shiratori route.
